title: The Glasshouse 2006 (Aussie Comedy)
description:
This is an almost complete collection of The Glasshouse 2006 from ABC TV (Australian Broadcasting Corporation). Unfortunately I missed the last episode (sob), but I think I recorded the majority of it.

The show revolved around the three lead comedians - Wil Anderson, Corinne Grant and Dave Hughes - leading a panel discussion on current events, news and pop culture of the day. It had a unique energy about it, a massive following and was always extremely funny. I wish I had more of it but sadly this was all I had by the time I decided to produce digital versions of it.

I originally recorded it onto VHS tape (yes folks - it's a VHS rip). I captured to MPEG2 through a Winfast PVR Capture Card at high quality. Eventually I compressed the DVD's to AVI with XVID video and MP3 audio. Recently, I remastered the soundtracks in Audacity (levelling them up to -1dB)and remuxed the XVID video with the new AC3 soundtrack into MKV format.

No matter what, I have tried to maintain or improve the integrity of the video and audio for the best possible outcomes. So here it is... The Glasshouse 2006.

Cheers and enjoy,
MoofieMan

PS: For more cool Aussie satire check out http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/11625440/Shaun_Micallef_s_Mad_As_Hell


PPS: Please seed as I'm on limited bandwidth and can't do it by myself. Thanks, MM
